Html:
Has anybody converter from GoogleEarth cash into Great Maps cash?

Google maps (satelite) always bans during image loading. Does anybody know how to download files in order to avoid ban?
wait another day and retry? google has access limits on satellite

Yes, after one day, google allow access, but now google bans faster.

If set special cookies (from page maps.google.com) and send special requests (sometimes), then you can avoid ban.

Does anybody know what cookies should be in request?
